org.elasticsearch.index.snapshots

Class IndexShardSnapshotAndRestoreService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.elasticsearch.index.shard.AbstractIndexShardComponent
      • org.elasticsearch.index.snapshots.IndexShardSnapshotAndRestoreService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IndexShardComponent

    public class IndexShardSnapshotAndRestoreService
extends AbstractIndexShardComponent
    Shard level snapshot and restore service

    Performs snapshot and restore operations on the shard level.
